sentences.en: Alcohol has a noticeable effect on the body.
sentences.cn: 酒精对身体有明显的影响。

sentences.en: It is noticeable that women do not have the rivalry that men have.
sentences.cn: 显而易见，女性不像男人们那样好勇斗狠。

sentences.en: It was noticeable that many of them avoided answering the question.
sentences.cn: 显而易见，他们中的许多人对这个问题都避而不答。

sentences.en: Many people in Minnesota and Tennessee have noticeable regional accents.
sentences.cn: 明尼苏达州和田纳西州的许多人都有明显的地区口音。

sentences.en: Several famous peaks are said to be noticeable in the far distance.
sentences.cn: 据说几个著名的山峰在远方都看得见.

sentences.en: She was most noticeable , I thought, in respect of her extremities.
sentences.cn: 我觉得她那副穷极可怜的样子实在太惹人注目.

sentences.en: The carpet of leaves in my yard became more and more noticeable.
sentences.cn: 我的院子里的落叶越来越厚。

sentences.en: The changes are insidious, and will not produce a noticeable effect for 15 to 20 years.
sentences.cn: 变化是悄然发生的,15到20年间不会产生明显影响。

sentences.en: The class has made noticeable improvement.
sentences.cn: 这个班已有引人注目的进步.

sentences.en: The damage to my car is hardly noticeable.
sentences.cn: 我的汽车被损坏的地方不大明显.

sentences.en: The effect of the medicine is not yet noticeable.
The most noticeable effect of these changes is in the way people are now working together.
sentences.cn: 这些变化带来的最明显效果体现在人们现在一起工作的方式上。

sentences.en: The operation was successful. The cheek indentation was now just barely noticeable.
sentences.cn: 手术很成功, 左边脸上原来那块凹处简直看不见了.

sentences.en: The result of this experiment was not noticeable for a long period.
sentences.cn: 这个实验结果长期不显著.

sentences.en: There's also been a noticeable rise in the political temperature.
sentences.cn: 政治气氛也明显升温了。

sentences.en: There's been a noticeable improvement in his handwriting.
sentences.cn: 他的书法有了明显的进步.

sentences.en: This effect is particularly noticeable in younger patients.
sentences.cn: 这种作用在年轻一些的病人身上尤为明显。

words.tran_cn: 著名的；显著的；附有乐谱的
显著地，明显地；引人注目地
注意；记下（note的过去式和过去分词）
显而易见的，显著的；值得注意的

trans.tran_cn: 显而易见的，明显的，引人注目的，令人瞩目的，显著的，重要的，可以察觉的
